Design Attribute Guide

Text ColorsValueExamplesUsage
colorTextButtonBrandrgb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for brandable primary button
colorTextButtonBrandHoverrgb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for brandable primary button - hover state
colorTextButtonBrandActivergb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for brandable primary button - active state
colorTextButtonBrandDisabledrgb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for brandable primary button - disabled state
colorTextButtonDefaultrgb(0, 112, 210)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for default secondary button
colorTextButtonDefaultHoverrgb(0, 112, 210)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for default secondary button - hover state
colorTextButtonDefaultActivergb(0, 112, 210)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for default secondary button - active state
colorTextButtonDefaultDisabledrgb(216, 221, 230)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for default secondary button - disabled state
colorTextButtonDefaultHintrgb(159, 170, 181)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.
colorTextButtonInversergb(224, 229, 238)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.
colorTextButtonInverseDisabledrgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.
colorTextIconDefaultrgb(84, 105, 141)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Default icon color.
colorTextIconDefaultHintrgb(159, 170, 181)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Icon color for a button that has a parent element that has a hover state. This is the default text/icon color for that button before its parent has been hovered over.
colorTextIconDefaultHoverrgb(0, 112, 210)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Default icon color - hover state.
colorTextIconDefaultActivergb(0, 57, 107)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Default icon color - active state.
colorTextIconDefaultDisabledrgb(216, 221, 230)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Default icon color - disabled state
colorTextIconInversergb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Icon color on dark background
colorTextIconInverseHoverrgb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Icon color on dark background - hover state
colorTextIconInverseActivergb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Icon color on dark background - active state
colorTextIconInverseDisabledrgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Icon color on dark background - disabled state
colorTextLabelrgb(84, 105, 141)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for field labels.
colorTextPlaceholderrgb(84, 105, 141)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Input placeholder text.
colorTextPlaceholderInversergb(224, 229, 238)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Input placeholder text on dark backgrounds.
colorTextRequiredrgb(212, 80, 76)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color of required field marker.
colorTextPillrgb(0, 112, 210)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text color for pills.
colorTextActionLabelrgb(84, 105, 141)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Action label text color
colorTextActionLabelActivergb(22, 50, 92)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Action label active text color
colorTextBrowserrgb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Top bar icon color
colorTextBrowserActivergba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Top bar active icon color
colorTextCustomerrgb(255, 154, 60)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Customer text used in anchor subtitle
colorTextDefaultrgb(22, 50, 92)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Body text color
colorTextErrorrgb(194, 57, 52)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Error text for inputs and error misc
colorTextInputDisabledrgb(84, 105, 141)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Input disabled text
colorTextInputFocusInversergb(22, 50, 92)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Typed input text
colorTextInputIconrgb(159, 170, 181)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Input icon
colorTextInversergb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Inverse text color for dark backgrounds
colorTextInverseWeakrgb(159, 170, 181)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Weak inverse text color for dark backgrounds
colorTextInverseActivergb(94, 180, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Active state on a standalone link on a dark background.
colorTextInverseHoverrgb(159, 170, 181)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Hover state on a standalone link on a dark background.
colorTextLinkrgb(0, 112, 210)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Link text (508)
colorTextLinkActivergb(0, 57, 107)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Active link text
colorTextLinkDisabledrgb(22, 50, 92)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Disabled link text

colorTextLinkInverseDisabledrgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Link color on dark background - disabled state
colorTextModalrgb(255, 255, 255)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Modal header title
colorTextModalButtonrgb(84, 105, 141)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Modal header button text color
colorTextStageLeftrgb(224, 229, 238)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Text in stage left navigation.
colorTextTabLabelrgb(22, 50, 92)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for default text in a tab group.
colorTextTabLabelSelectedrgb(0, 112, 210)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for text on a selected tab in a tab group.
colorTextTabLabelHoverrgb(0, 95, 178)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for text in hover state in a tab group.
colorTextTabLabelFocusrgb(0, 95, 178)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for text in focus state in a tab group.
colorTextTabLabelActivergb(0, 57, 107)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for text in active state in a tab group.
colorTextTabLabelDisabledrgb(224, 229, 238)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for disabled text in a tab group.
colorTextToastrgb(224, 229, 238)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for text on toast messages.
colorTextWarningrgb(255, 183, 93)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for texts or icons that are related to warnings.
colorTextWeakrgb(84, 105, 141)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for text that is purposefully de-emphasized to create visual hierarchy.
colorTextIconBrandrgb(0, 112, 210)The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Color for non-interactive icons that represent a selected item in a list
Background ColorsValueExamplesUsage
colorBackgroundrgb(244, 246, 249)Default background color for the whole app.
colorBackgroundAltrgb(255, 255, 255)Second default background color for the app.
colorBackgroundAlt2rgb(238, 241, 246)Used when further differentiation is needed because colorBackground and colorBackgroundAlt are both being used in close proximity.
colorBackgroundAltInversergb(22, 50, 92)Alternative background color for dark portions of the app.
colorBackgroundRowHoverrgb(244, 246, 249)Used as the background color for the hover state on rows or items on list-like components.
colorBackgroundRowActivergb(238, 241, 246)Used as the background color for the active state on rows or items on list-like components.
colorBackgroundRowSelectedrgb(240, 248, 252)Used as the background color for selected rows or items on list-like components.
colorBackgroundRowNewrgb(250, 255, 189)Used as the background color for the new state on rows or items on list-like components.
colorBackgroundInversergb(6, 28, 63)Default background color for dark portions of the app (like Stage Left or tooltips).
colorBackgroundAnchorrgb(244, 246, 249)Background color for the anchor area.
colorBackgroundBrowserrgb(84, 105, 141)Secondary top bar background color (child browser, file preview, etc.)
colorBackgroundChromeMobilergb(0, 112, 210)Background color for default mobile chrome (ex. global header)
colorBackgroundChromeDesktoprgb(255, 255, 255)Background color for default desktop chrome (ex. global header)
colorBackgroundCustomerrgb(255, 154, 60)Background color for UI elements related to the concept of an external user or customer.
colorBackgroundHighlightrgb(250, 255, 189)Background color for highlighting text.
colorBackgroundActionbarIconUtilityrgb(84, 105, 141)Background for utility icons that live in the action bar on mobile.
colorBackgroundIndicatorDotrgb(159, 170, 181)Color of the indicator dot.
colorBackgroundModalrgb(255, 255, 255)Standard modal header
colorBackgroundModalBrandrgb(0, 112, 210)Brandable modal header
colorBackgroundNotificationBadgergb(194, 57, 52)Notifications badge background color.
colorBackgroundNotificationBadgeHoverrgb(0, 95, 178)Notifications badge background color.
colorBackgroundNotificationBadgeFocusrgb(0, 95, 178)Notifications badge background color.
colorBackgroundNotificationBadgeActivergb(0, 57, 107)Notifications badge background color.
colorBackgroundNotificationNewrgb(240, 248, 252)Background color for a new notification list item.
colorBackgroundOrgSwitcherArrowrgb(6, 28, 63)Stage left org switcher dropdown arrow background color.
colorBackgroundPayloadrgb(244, 246, 249)Background color for payloads in the feed.
colorBackgroundShadergb(224, 229, 238)Used as background for visual app builder.
colorBackgroundStencilrgb(238, 241, 246)Used as background for loading stencils on white background.
colorBackgroundStencilAltrgb(224, 229, 238)Used as an alternate background for loading stencils on gray backgrounds.
colorBackgroundTempModalrgba(126, 140, 153, 0.8)Used as the default background color for temporary dialog elements, such as the progress spinner background.
colorBackgroundTempModalTintrgba(126, 140, 153, 0.8)The color of the mask overlay that appears when you enter a modal state.
colorBackgroundTempModalTintAltrgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75)The color of the mask overlay that appears when you enter a modal state.
colorBackgroundScrollbarrgb(224, 229, 238)The background color of an internal scrollbar.
colorBackgroundScrollbarTrackrgb(168, 183, 199)The background color of an internal scrollbar track.
colorBrandrgb(21, 137, 238)Our product brand blue.
colorBrandDarkrgb(0, 112, 210)Our product brand blue, darkened to meet accessibility color contrast ratios with white text.
colorBackgroundButtonBrandrgb(0, 112, 210)Brandable primary button
colorBackgroundButtonBrandActivergb(0, 57, 107)Brandable primary button - active state
colorBackgroundButtonBrandHoverrgb(0, 95, 178)Brandable primary button - hover state
colorBackgroundButtonBrandDisabledrgb(224, 229, 238)Brandable primary button - disabled state
colorBackgroundButtonDefaultrgb(255, 255, 255)Default secondary button
colorBackgroundButtonDefaultHoverrgb(244, 246, 249)Default secondary button - hover state
colorBackgroundButtonDefaultFocusrgb(244, 246, 249)Default secondary button - focus state
colorBackgroundButtonDefaultActivergb(238, 241, 246)Default secondary button - active state
colorBackgroundButtonDefaultDisabledrgb(255, 255, 255)Default secondary button - disabled state
colorBackgroundButtonIconrgba(0, 0, 0, 0)Background color for icon-only button
colorBackgroundButtonIconHoverrgb(244, 246, 249)Background color for icon-only button - hover state
colorBackgroundButtonIconFocusrgb(244, 246, 249)Background color for icon-only button - focus state
colorBackgroundButtonIconActivergb(238, 241, 246)Background color for icon-only button - active state
colorBackgroundButtonIconDisabledrgb(255, 255, 255)Background color for icon-only button - disabled state
colorBackgroundButtonInversergba(0, 0, 0, 0)Button backgrounds on inverse/dark backgrounds
colorBackgroundButtonInverseActivergba(0, 0, 0, 0.24)Active button backgrounds on inverse backgrounds on mobile
colorBackgroundButtonInverseDisabledrgba(0, 0, 0, 0)Disabled button backgrounds on inverse/dark backgrounds
colorBackgroundModalButtonrgba(0, 0, 0, 0.07)Button backgrounds on modal headers
colorBackgroundModalButtonActivergba(0, 0, 0, 0.16)Active button backgrounds on modal headers
colorBackgroundInputrgb(255, 255, 255)Default input field
colorBackgroundInputActivergb(255, 255, 255)Selected input field (when user has clicked or tabbed into field)
colorBackgroundInputCheckboxrgb(255, 255, 255)Default checkboxes
colorBackgroundInputCheckboxDisabledrgb(216, 221, 230)Disabled checkboxes
colorBackgroundInputCheckboxSelectedrgb(21, 137, 238)Selected checkboxes
colorBackgroundInputDisabledrgb(224, 229, 238)Disabled input
colorBackgroundInputErrorrgb(255, 221, 225)Background color for input field that has encountered an error.
colorBackgroundInputSearchrgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16)Background color for search input fields.
colorBackgroundPillrgb(255, 255, 255)Background color for pills.
colorBackgroundErrorrgb(212, 80, 76)Color for UI elements related to errors.
colorBackgroundErrorAltrgb(234, 130, 136)Alternative color for UI elements related to errors.
colorBackgroundSuccessrgb(75, 202, 129)Color for UI elements that have to do with success.
colorBackgroundToastrgb(84, 105, 141)Background color for toast messaging.
colorBackgroundToastSuccessrgb(4, 132, 75)Background color for success toast messaging.
colorBackgroundToastErrorrgb(194, 57, 52)Background color for error toast messaging.
colorBackgroundWarningrgb(255, 183, 93)Color for UI elements that have to do with warning.
Border ColorsValueExamplesUsage
colorBorderrgb(216, 221, 230)Default border color for UI elements.
colorBorderBrandrgb(0, 112, 210)Branded border color.
colorBorderErrorrgb(194, 57, 52)Border color for UI elements that have to do with errors.
colorBorderSuccessrgb(75, 202, 129)Border color for UI elements that have to do with success.
colorBorderWarningrgb(255, 183, 93)Border color for UI elements that have to do with warnings.
colorBorderTabSelectedrgb(0, 112, 210)Border color for a selected tab in a tab group.
colorBorderSeparatorrgb(244, 246, 249)Lightest separator color - used as default separator on white backgrounds.
colorBorderSeparatorAltrgb(216, 221, 230)Medium separator color - used as default separator on light gray backgrounds.
colorBorderSeparatorAlt2rgb(168, 183, 199)Darkest separator color - used as an alternate separator color when more differentiation is desired.
colorBorderSeparatorInversergb(42, 66, 108)Used as a separator on dark backgrounds, such as stage left navigation.
colorBorderRowSelectedrgb(0, 112, 210)Used as the border color for selected rows or items on list-like components.
colorBorderRowSelectedHoverrgb(21, 137, 238)Used as the border color for the hover state on selected rows or items on list-like components.
colorBorderHintrgb(42, 66, 108)Used to delineate the boundary of a specific region. Specific to builders.
colorBorderSelectionrgb(0, 112, 210)Used to delineate the boundary of a selected component. Specific to builders.
colorBorderSelectionHoverrgb(21, 137, 238)Used to delineate the boundary of a component that is being hovered over. Specific to builders.
colorBorderSelectionActivergb(244, 246, 249)Used to delineate the boundary of a component that is being clicked. Specific to builders.
colorBorderCanvasElementSelectionrgb(94, 180, 255)Used to delineate the boundary of a selected canvas element. Specific to builders.
colorBorderCanvasElementSelectionHoverrgb(0, 95, 178)Used to delineate the boundary of a selected canvas element that is being hovered over. Specific to builders.
colorBorderButtonBrandrgb(0, 112, 210)Border color for brandable primary button
colorBorderButtonBrandDisabledrgba(0, 0, 0, 0)Border color for brandable primary button - disabled state
colorBorderButtonDefaultrgb(216, 221, 230)Border color for default secondary button
colorBorderButtonInverseDisabledrgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15)Border color for disabled inverse button.
colorBorderInputrgb(216, 221, 230)Border color on form elements.
colorBorderInputActivergb(21, 137, 238)Border color on active form elements.
colorBorderInputDisabledrgb(168, 183, 199)Border color on disabled form elements.
colorBorderInputCheckboxSelectedCheckmarkrgb(255, 255, 255)The borders to create the checkmark
FontsValueExamplesUsage
fontFamily'Salesforce Sans', Arial, sans-serif
Aa
fontFamilyBody'SalesforceSans-Regular', Arial, sans-serif
Aa
fontFamilyLight'SalesforceSans-Light', Arial, sans-serif
Aa
fontFamilyStrong'SalesforceSans-Bold', Arial, sans-serif
Aa
fontWeightLight300
Aa
Use for large headings only.
fontWeightRegular400
Aa
Most all body copy.
fontWeightBold700
Aa
Used sparingly for emphasized text within regular body copy.
